javadoc: Methods called by the DropTargetAdapter that implements the DropTargetListener interface

methods.name: isDropOk
methods.comment: Return true if is OK to drop the transferable at the location specified the event

params.name: e
params.comment: event that has current state of drag and drop operation

methods.name: dragUnderFeedback
methods.comment: Set drag feedback according to the ok parameter

params.name: ok
params.comment: true means the drop action is OK

params.name: e
params.comment: event that has current state of drag and drop operation

methods.javadoc: Revert back to normal if any drag feedback was set
methods.name: undoDragUnderFeedback
methods.comment: Revert back to normal if any drag feedback was set

methods.name: add
methods.comment:
Add the object to the droppable component. The DropTargetAdapter
 calls this method from its drop() method.

params.name: obj
params.comment: Transferable object that is to be dropped.

params.name: e
params.comment: has current state of drop operation

params.name: f
params.comment:
represents the opaque concept of a data format as 
 would appear on a clipboard, during drag and drop.

name: Droppable
comment: Methods called by the DropTargetAdapter that implements the DropTargetListener interface
